groups.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.gateway
groups.description: Configuration properties for MCP gateway service discovery.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.gateway.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the MCP gateway service discovery.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.gateway.registry
properties.description: Which registry center gateway discovery of MCP server info from .

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.gateway.sse.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable SSE transport for MCP Gateway.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.gateway.sse.endpoint
properties.description: SSE endpoint path for MCP Gateway.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.gateway.streamable.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Streamable HTTP transport for MCP Gateway.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.gateway.streamable.endpoint
properties.description: Streamable HTTP endpoint path for MCP Gateway.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mcp.gateway.streamable.protocol-version
properties.description: Protocol version for Streamable HTTP transport.
